subject: Re: [junit] Need Help
msgSnippet: hai thanks for ur suggestion, but the problem is that i am not able to down load the exec and after downloading ..how do i integrate with WSAD. REgards
messageBody:
hai thanks for ur suggestion,

but the problem is that i am not able to down load the exec and after downloading ..how do i integrate with WSAD.



REgards

Murueksh





QuikDraw <quikdraw@...> wrote: > hai all,
> Is there any tool available..that i can integrated with WSAD so
> that i can check for the code coverage of the JUnitcode which a
> person writes in his project.

On the Open Source front, try NoUnit (nounit.sf.net).
For a good commercial tool, try Clover (www.thecortex.net/clover).

Thanks, Derek
=====================================
--- The Gunslinger
quikdraw@...
